title: Router: Documentation
description: Routes documentation requests to baseline/API/community/architecture packs.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[docs request] --> Pick{need?}
  Pick -->|baseline docs| Base[pack.docs.baseline.v1]
  Pick -->|api reference| Api[pack.docs.api_reference.v1]
  Pick -->|community files| Comm[pack.docs.community.v1]
  Pick -->|architecture + adrs| Arch[pack.docs.architecture.deepen.v1]
  Pick -->|unsure| Base
